hero.name: Kelvin M. Mwau
hero.heading: Hey! Iâ€™m Mulikevs
hero.description: I am a Software developer from Nairobi Kenya, with a strong focus in Java (Spring), Php (Codeighniter|Laravel), RPA (Power Automate|UIPATH) and DevSecOps. I love to get new experiences and always learn from my surroundings. I've done multiple projects. You can check it through portfolio section on this website. I looking forward to any opportunities and challenges

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
about.description: Kelvin is a passionate full-stack developer with extensive expertise in web and app development. With a deep understanding of languages and technologies like Java, JavaScript, Python, PHP, and Kotlin, Kelvin possesses a broad range of technical knowledge. Furthermore, Kelvin is proficient in popular frameworks and libraries such asSpring Boot ReactJS, Angular, and Node.js. Kelvin strives to create innovative and impactful solutions in the world of software development.

allExperience.companyDescription:
Developing and managing SOA integrations using webservices technologies (SOAP, REST, UDDI, WSDL) and implementing a DevOps CI/CD pipeline with Peer Programming, Version Control (TFS and Git), Jenkins, and TIBCO TEA for service hosting.
Developing Backend applications in Java spring boot and PHPLaravel using a React JS front end, and Oracle or my SQL databases.
Developing, Enhancing, Testing and Digitizing BPMS workflows using process maker.
Reviewing current systems, monitoring performance and maintaining systems to secure efficiency and compliance to organization policies (PCIDSS) and procedures.
Managing existing systems. Database indexing and optimization. Repository Management SVN. Collaborating with other developers, quality assurance and DevOps Officers.

Software Development(Java, PHP, React,JS, Python), Mobile App development (Android and hybrid),Database(Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL,SQLite, SQL Server). DevOps: Implementing and managing end-to-end Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) processes utilizing Git,Jenkins, and Terraform. Containers & Orchestration: Proficient in utilizing Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for orchestration, ensuring efficient management and scalability of applications.
Fully supported, configured, maintained and upgraded cloud and physical and virtual environment(Both Linux and Windows).

allTestimonial.reviewText: Muli's attention to detail and commitment to quality were instrumental in our project's success. His ability to code efficiently and troubleshoot issues made a significant impact. It was a great experience working alongside him

Kelvin is a highly skilled and experienced software developer. He is always willing to go the extra mile to get the job done and are always looking for ways to improve our systems. Kelvin is also a great team player and is always willing to help others. I highly recommend Kelvin for any software development position.

Working with Kelvin is a pleasure. His technical knowledge and collaborative approach made our projects run smoothly. He's a team player, always ready to share insights and support team members. I look forward to future collaborations with him.

Kelvin delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations. His ability to understand our needs and translate them into a user-friendly application was impressive. We're grateful for his dedication to our project's success.
